cause.description:
Many women are diagnosed with this illness every year. Awareness has been raised over the past couple of years but more can be done.
1. Awareness to be brought to people of all ages
2. To raise money for more research to be done
3. To help those in need and for support to those who suffer from this in any way
cause.mission: Raise awareness of the devistation caused by this illness.
cause.name: Awareness for Breast Cancer
